nodes.text: A village was located on the planet Hisseen during the the Clone Wars. During the opening stages of the conflict, the planet was placed under siege by the Confederacy of Independent Systems. In response, the Galactic Republic dispatched the 501st Legion, 212th Attack Battalion, and 104th Battalion under the command of Jedi Generals Anakin Skywalker, Obi-Wan Kenobi, and Plo Koon in order to keep it from falling into Separatist hands. At some point during the siege, the village was attacked by Separatist forces.
